text: Table 1. Dose-related signs and symptoms of salicylate poisoning Dose of ingested Salicylate concentration Signs and symptoms salicylate (mg/kg mg/L) in adults 9 ymp Nausea, vomiting, tinnitus, deafness, 300 - 600 respiratory alkalosis Peripheral vasodilatation, sweating, agitation, 250 600 - 800 hypoglycaemia, decreased platelet function Metabolic acidosis, seizures, renal failure, > 800mg agitation, coma, CVS collapse, (rarely pulmonary and cerebral oedema)
